entry.title: Wind Chill Advisory issued March 14 at 11:41AM AKDT until March 15 at 12:00PM AKDT by NWS
entry.summary: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON AKDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Cold wind chills 40 to 50 below zero expected. The cold wind chills will cause frostbite in as little as 10 minutes to exposed skin. * WHERE...Southeastern Brooks Range.

entry.title: Special Weather Statement issued March 15 at 3:54AM CDT by NWS
